title: Four Bedroom House for Sale in Nugegoda
details:
Recently constructed modern house offering four bedrooms and three bathrooms. Located only 700 meters from the Delkanda Junction in Nugegoda, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. The house features a spacious living & dining area, separate pantry and wet kitchen, rooftop terrace and landscaped garden.

The master bedroom sits on the 1st floor, thoughtfully designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom. Additionally there are two more bedrooms on the 1st floor and a guest bedroom on the ground floor. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in a quiet residential neighborhood.

- Constructed approx. 3 years ago.
- Four bedrooms. Two ensuite bedrooms.
- Three bathrooms. Two bathrooms equipped with electric hot water.
- Separate pantry and wet kitchen equipped with fitted cupboards.
- Landscaped outdoor garden.
- Rooftop terrace equipped with sitting area.
- Maids bathroom. Provision for maids bedroom.
- Electric roller garage door with two covered parking spaces.

Price negotiable upon inspection.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
